* Let <math>n \in \mathbb{N}</math> we claim that the number of lattice paths from from <math>\left( 0, 0 \right)</math> to <math>\left( n, n \right)</math> which never go above the diagonal line <math>y = x</math> is the [[Catalan Number|<math>n</math>-th catalan number]].
